general.name: Sandy Aprilyanto
general.headline: Undergraduate in Information System | Data Analyst
about: Final year Information System student with strong data analysis, statistical modeling, and visualization skills.
Proficient in Python, SQL, Excel, Power BI, and Tableau. Demonstrates analytical thinking, problem-solving, and passion for data-driven decision-making.
